text: لُعِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ لِسَانِ دَاوُۥدَ وَعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا۟ وَّكَانُوا۟ يَعْتَدُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Cursed were those who disbelieved among the Children of Israel by the tongue of David and of Jesus, the son of Mary. That was because they disobeyed and [habitually] transgressed.
translation.id.indonesian: Telah dilaknati orang-orang kafir dari Bani Israil dengan lisan Daud dan Isa putera Maryam. Yang demikian itu, disebabkan mereka durhaka dan selalu melampaui batas.
